meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the extinct group of cephalopod mollusks known as ammonites.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ammonitic fossils to learn more about ancient sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a beautiful collection of colorful, ammonitic shells.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be ancient explorers discovering mysterious, ammonitic treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated with swirling patterns reminiscent of an ammonitic design.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid mural depicting the graceful movements of an ammonitic creature.

meanings.definition: Having the spiral shape or ornamentation of an ammonite shell.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry designer created a stunning necklace inspired by the elegant, ammonitic patterns.
meanings.sent2: The seashell found on the beach had a unique, ammonitic spiral.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with icing swirls resembling an intricate, ammonitic design.
meanings.sent4: The tornado in the distance looked like a giant, swirling, ammonitic shell.
meanings.sent5: The staircase had a beautiful, spiraling banister reminiscent of an ancient, ammonitic structure.
